courseDetails.title: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies
courseDetails.shortDescription: Introductional course, Usage of Research and Analytical Methodologies in Business and Science
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Cristiana Silva is a senior education technician with 4 years' experience in coordinating pedagogical and social projects in Higher Education Institutions and Private Social Solidarity Institutions. She began her work in an academic environment, where she obtained her Master's Degree in Education, in the specialization area of Adult Education and Community Intervention at the University of Minho and worked as an educational researcher, responsible for designing course curricula and managing course quality assessment processes. She is currently a learning designer at the Polytechnic of Cávado and Ave in Barcelos. With a passion for adult education, she has also been president of the C.R.I.A. Dialogues Association since 2021.


The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Business or Science

courseDetails.title: AutoCAD 2D for Architects: Tools & Real Project Fast
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master AutoCAD for architecture: learn drawing tools, layers, dimensions, and apply them in a real design project
courseDetails.longDescription:
This short and focused AutoCAD course is designed for architecture students and aspiring designers who want quick yet comprehensive training. In just 3 to 4 hours, you’ll learn all the essential AutoCAD tools and commands step by step, with a strong focus on real-world architectural workflows.

Through a complete hands-on project, you'll apply what you learn to design and draft a small architectural plan from scratch—making this course both practical and skill-based. Whether you're a total beginner or someone looking to refresh your AutoCAD skills, this course will give you the confidence to start using AutoCAD in your design work immediately.

By the end of the course, you'll not only understand how AutoCAD works, but you'll also know how to manage layers, use dimensioning tools, create blocks, and prepare your files for plotting and printing. You'll gain valuable drafting skills that are essential for academic projects or real architectural practice.


What you’ll learn:

  • AutoCAD interface and essential settings

  • Drawing tools (line, polyline, rectangle, circle, etc.)

  • Modify tools (offset, trim, extend, mirror, etc.)

  • Layers, blocks, hatching, annotations, and dimensions

  • Page setup and plotting for printing

  • Complete architectural project: drafting a small house plan from start to finish


No prior experience is required—just your interest in architecture and design.

This course has been co-created with Ms. Fatemeh Kazemi, who had delivered a significant portion of the instructional content. Her valuable contribution ensures a rich and comprehensive learning experience.
targetAudiences: Beginners: Individuals who are completely new to AutoCAD or computer-aided design (CAD) and want to learn from the ground up.
Aspiring Designers and Architects: Students or professionals who want to learn AutoCAD for architectural design, interior design, or related fields.
Engineers and Draftsmen: Anyone in the engineering or drafting fields looking to improve their skills or learn AutoCAD to create precise technical drawings
Professionals Switching Careers: People considering a career change into design or architecture and looking to gain proficiency in AutoCAD.
Hobbyists: Those who are passionate about 2D and 3D design and want to explore AutoCAD for personal projects.
Essentially, this course is for anyone who wants to learn AutoCAD, regardless of prior experience or background.

courseDetails.title: Certificado Profissional em Gestão de Projetos
courseDetails.shortDescription: Compreender a Gestão de Projetos, Funções Principais, Papel de um Gestor de Projeto, Project Lifecycle, Metodologia
courseDetails.longDescription:
Bem-vindo ao Curso: Certificado Profissional em Liderança e Gestão


Curso ministrado pelo MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance.  

O MTF é um instituto global de educação e investigação, com sede em Lisboa, Portugal, focado na formação empresarial e profissional híbrida (presencial e online) nas áreas de: Negócios e Administração, Ciência e Tecnologia, Banca e Finanças.

O centro de I&D do MTF foca-se em atividades de investigação nas áreas de: Inteligência Artificial, Aprendizagem Automática (Machine Learning), Ciência de Dados, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Criptomoedas e Ativos Digitais, Metaversos, Transformação Digital, Fintech, Comércio Eletrónico e Internet das Coisas.

O MTF é parceiro oficial da IBM, Intel e Microsoft, e membro da Câmara de Comércio e Indústria Portuguesa.

O MTF está presente em 213 países e foi escolhido por mais de 560 000 alunos.


Autor do curso:

Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva é uma profissional distinta com uma sólida combinação de experiência académica e empresarial, especializada em gestão, ética, desenvolvimento estratégico e liderança. Obteve o Doutoramento em Gestão pela Universidade Lusíada de Lisboa, onde se destacou nas áreas de gestão empresarial, e-commerce, análise crítica de modelos de gestão e metodologias de investigação avançadas, recebendo grande reconhecimento pelas suas contribuições na área.

Atualmente, exerce funções como Gestora de Projetos na Associação Portuguesa de Ética Empresarial (APEE). Este papel sublinha o seu compromisso com a promoção da inovação ética e da sustentabilidade nas organizações e nos setores público e privado.

Relativamente à sua área académica, Ana Saraiva fez contribuições significativas como consultora e investigadora no centro de investigação COMEGI da Universidade Lusíada. Colaborou com prestigiadas instituições nacionais e internacionais, incluindo o IST (Universidade de Lisboa) e várias universidades europeias, avançando na investigação e implementando soluções inovadoras nas práticas de gestão organizacionais. A sua experiência editorial inclui a gestão e indexação de revistas científicas em plataformas como Scopus, DOAJ e outras de prestígio, refletindo a sua dedicação nos elevados padrões académicos.

Com uma experiência empresarial de mais de uma década, Ana trabalhou na hotelaria de luxo, onde liderou esforços na coordenação de eventos, na garantia de qualidade e na satisfação dos hóspedes. Possui um histórico comprovado de melhoria da excelência operacional e gestão estratégica, sendo uma líder versátil e capaz de impulsionar resultados nos mais diversificados contextos.

A produção académica de Ana Saraiva é vasta, incluindo numerosos artigos revistos por pares e apresentações em conferências que abordam questões críticas em gestão, ética e transformação digital. É proficiente numa ampla gama de ferramentas e plataformas digitais, como SPSS, SAS e NVivo, utilizadas para otimizar os resultados de investigação e de negócios.

Com uma paixão pela colaboração interdisciplinar e um compromisso com práticas éticas e sustentáveis, Ana Cristina M. B. Saraiva dedica-se a capacitar organizações e indivíduos para alcançar a excelência através de soluções inovadoras e liderança responsável no panorama global dos negócios.


O que é Gestão de Projetos?

Gestão de projetos é a aplicação organizada de conhecimentos, processos, habilidades e ferramentas para guiar um projeto desde o seu início até a sua conclusão bem-sucedida. Envolve:

  • Definir metas: Decidir o que o projeto deve alcançar.

  • Planejamento: Mapear as etapas e os recursos necessários.

  • Execução: Colocar o plano em ação, direcionar a equipe e gerenciar os recursos.

  • Monitoramento e controle: Acompanhar o progresso, gerenciar mudanças e resolver problemas.

  • Encerramento: Revisar o projeto, documentar os resultados e aprender com a experiência.


O que é Gestão de Projetos de Negócios?

A gestão de projetos de negócios refere-se à aplicação de princípios de gestão de projetos em um ambiente de negócios. Esses projetos se concentram em alcançar objetivos de negócios, como:

  • Lançamento de novos produtos ou serviços

  • Melhorar ou automatizar processos de negócios

  • Reestruturar departamentos

  • Implementar novos sistemas de software


O Papel da Gestão de Projetos

A gestão de projetos desempenha um papel fundamental nas empresas porque:

  • Aumenta a Eficiência: Um plano de projeto bem definido ajuda a otimizar o trabalho e evitar o desperdício de esforço.

  • Garante Resultados: A gestão de projetos mantém o foco em cumprir as metas definidas dentro das restrições de tempo e orçamento.

  • Gerencia Riscos: Problemas potenciais são antecipados e mitigados por meio de planejamento e monitoramento cuidadosos.

  • Melhora a Comunicação: Canais de comunicação claros entre membros da equipe, stakeholders e clientes ajudam a evitar mal-entendidos.

  • Melhora a Satisfação do Cliente: A conclusão bem-sucedida do projeto dentro dos parâmetros acordados gera confiança com os clientes.


Por que aprender gestão de projetos é importante para as empresas?

As empresas investem no treinamento de gestão de projetos de seus funcionários porque:

  • Vantagem Competitiva: Empresas com fortes capacidades de gestão de projetos entregam projetos com mais sucesso, ganham reputação de confiabilidade e superam os concorrentes.

  • Reduz Custos: Projetos ineficientes custam mais devido a atrasos e desperdício de recursos. A gestão de projetos ajuda a otimizar os recursos.

  • Melhora o Moral dos Funcionários: Projetos bem administrados minimizam o estresse, melhoram a colaboração da equipe e criam um senso de realização.

  • Melhora a Inovação: A gestão de projetos estruturada permite gerenciar projetos de inovação, levando a uma cultura de inovação dentro da empresa.


Como as habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos impulsionam sua carreira

Desenvolver suas habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos pode melhorar significativamente suas perspectivas de carreira:

  • Alta Demanda: Gerentes de projeto são procurados em todos os setores, como TI, construção, saúde, etc.

  • Melhor Salário: Gerentes de projeto qualificados geralmente ganham salários mais altos devido à sua experiência.

  • Potencial de Liderança: A gestão de projetos fornece uma base sólida para assumir funções de liderança dentro das organizações.

  • Versatilidade: As habilidades de gerenciamento de projetos se aplicam a uma ampla gama de empregos e funções, não apenas a cargos de gerenciamento de projetos.

  • Crescimento Pessoal: Você desenvolverá habilidades organizacionais, de resolução de problemas e de comunicação, tornando-se um trunfo para qualquer equipe.
targetAudiences: Sem requisitos especiais. Um curso para qualquer pessoa que queira construir uma carreira em Gestão

courseDetails.title: Certified Business Analyst: Tools, Techniques & Frameworks
courseDetails.shortDescription: Business Analysis Mastery: Requirements, Modeling, Strategic Planning, Agile & BABOK for Certification Success.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock Your Potential as a Certified Business Analyst

Welcome to "Certified Business Analyst: Tools, Techniques & Frameworks," the most comprehensive and practical course designed to transform you into a highly capable and certified Business Analyst. This course is meticulously crafted to equip you with the essential knowledge, practical tools, and strategic frameworks needed to excel in any business environment.

In today's rapidly evolving business landscape, organizations heavily rely on skilled Business Analysts to bridge the gap between business needs and technical solutions. This program goes beyond theoretical concepts, diving deep into real-world scenarios and providing actionable insights that you can immediately apply. You'll not only understand *what* Business Analysis is but also *how* to perform it effectively, from initial stakeholder engagement to solution validation.


What Makes This Course Unique?

This course stands out by offering a unique blend of foundational principles, practical application, and certification readiness. We cover the entire Business Analysis Body of Knowledge (BABOK® Guide) core concepts, making it an excellent resource for those pursuing industry certifications like the ECBA, CCBA, or CBAP. You'll gain hands-on experience with industry-standard tools and techniques for requirements elicitation, analysis, modeling, and management.

We emphasize a pragmatic approach, focusing on delivering tangible value. You'll learn how to navigate complex projects, communicate effectively with stakeholders, and drive successful outcomes, whether in traditional waterfall or agile environments. By the end of this course, you will possess a robust toolkit and a strategic mindset, positioning you as an invaluable asset to any organization.


Join us and take the definitive step towards a rewarding and impactful career in Business Analysis!
targetAudiences: Aspiring Business Analysts seeking a comprehensive career foundation.

courseDetails.title: Certified Brand Strategy: Build, Position & Elevate Brand
courseDetails.shortDescription: Brand Strategy & Branding: Master Brand Building, Positioning, Storytelling & Certification for Impactful Growth.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the power of your brand with 'Certified Brand Strategy: Build, Position & Elevate Brand'! This comprehensive course provides you with the essential knowledge, practical tools, and strategic frameworks to master the art and science of brand strategy. Whether you're an aspiring brand professional, an entrepreneur, or a marketing expert, this program will transform your understanding of how brands are built, positioned, and nurtured for sustainable success.


Why Brand Strategy Matters

In today's competitive landscape, a strong brand is not just a logo; it's an asset that drives recognition, fosters loyalty, and commands premium value. This course demystifies brand strategy, showing you how to move beyond superficial branding to create a deeply resonant and strategically sound brand that connects with your audience and achieves business objectives.


What You'll Learn

We'll guide you step-by-step through the entire brand strategy lifecycle. You'll learn how to conduct thorough brand audits, define core brand identity elements, develop compelling positioning statements, craft impactful brand narratives, and implement effective brand launch and growth strategies. From market research to brand architecture, and from digital branding to crisis management, you'll gain a holistic perspective on building an enduring brand.


Your Path to Certification

What makes this course unique is its structured approach towards professional certification. Upon completion, you'll be well-prepared to sit for the Brand Strategy Certification exam, validating your expertise and significantly boosting your career prospects. We provide practical exercises, real-world case studies, and templates to ensure you not only understand the concepts but can confidently apply them.


Who Is This Course For?

This course is ideal for anyone looking to make a significant impact through brand strategy. Whether you're aiming to launch a new product, revitalize an existing brand, or simply deepen your strategic marketing skills, you'll find immense value here. Join us to become a certified expert in building, positioning, and elevating brands that truly stand out.

courseDetails.title: Professional Agile Methodology Certification
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Agile frameworks, Scrum, Kanban & Lean principles. Enhance project management skills with real-world applications
courseDetails.longDescription:
In today’s dynamic and fast-paced business environment, Agile methodologies have become the gold standard for software development and project management. Organizations worldwide are adopting Agile to enhance productivity, improve collaboration, and deliver high-quality products efficiently. This Professional Agile Methodology Certification course is designed to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of Agile principles, frameworks, and best practices, empowering you to lead and contribute to Agile teams successfully.

This course covers the fundamentals of Agile, including Scrum, Kanban, Lean, and SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework). You will learn how to implement Agile techniques such as iterative development, backlog management, sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives to improve efficiency and adaptability in your projects.

What You'll Learn:

  • Agile Mindset & Principles – Understand the Agile Manifesto, values, and benefits of Agile development.

  • Scrum Framework – Master Scrum roles (Product Owner, Scrum Master, Development Team), ceremonies, and artifacts.

  • Kanban & Lean – Learn how to visualize work, limit work in progress (WIP), and optimize workflows.

  • Sprint Planning & Execution – Effectively plan and manage sprints, prioritize backlogs, and track progress.

  • Agile Tools & Techniques – Experience with Jira, Trello, and other Agile tools for project tracking.

  • Scaling Agile – Learn how Agile works at scale using SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) for large enterprises.

  • Real-World Applications – Apply Agile to real-world case studies and industry scenarios.

  • Certification Preparation – Get ready for Agile and Scrum certifications with practice tests and expert guidance.

Who Should Take This Course?

  • Software Developers & Engineers who want to work in Agile teams.

  • Project Managers & Scrum Masters seeking Agile certification.

  • Business Analysts & Product Owners aiming to improve collaboration.

  • Entrepreneurs & Startups looking to implement Agile workflows.

  • Anyone interested in Agile methodologies and enhancing project management skills.

Why Take This Course?

  • Hands-on Learning – Interactive lessons, real-world case studies, and practical exercises.

  • Expert Guidance – Learn from industry professionals with Agile experience.

  • Career Growth – Enhance your resume with an Agile certification and boost your job opportunities.

  • Flexibility – Self-paced learning, accessible anytime, anywhere.

By the end of this course, you will have the skills and confidence to apply Agile methodologies in your workplace, drive efficiency, and lead Agile teams effectively. Whether you're looking to advance your career or adopt Agile for your organization, this certification course will set you on the right path.

Enroll now and take the first step toward becoming a certified Agile professional!
targetAudiences: Project managers who want to lead Agile teams effectively
Software developers looking to integrate Agile best practices into their workflow
Business analysts seeking to improve project collaboration and efficiency
IT professionals and team leaders who want to transition to Agile methodologies
Entrepreneurs and startup founders aiming to build Agile-driven businesses
Marketing professionals interested in applying Agile for campaign and workflow management
Anyone interested in Agile, regardless of prior experience, looking to develop an Agile mindset

courseDetails.title: Startup Launch Certification: Idea to MVP to Market
courseDetails.shortDescription: Startup Ecosystem & Venture Capital: Navigate Career Transition, Funding Landscape, Key Roles, and Networking Strategies
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you a seasoned professional contemplating a leap into the dynamic world of startups or the fast-paced venture capital industry?

This comprehensive course is designed specifically for you. Many professionals feel daunted by the perceived risks and unknown territories of the startup ecosystem or struggle to understand how their existing skills translate into this new domain. This course bridges that gap.

Why This Course?

This course cuts through the noise, offering a structured roadmap for experienced professionals to successfully transition into or engage with the startup and funding landscape. We demystify the jargon, illuminate the various career paths, and equip you with the practical knowledge needed to make informed decisions and thrive.

What You'll Learn?

You'll explore the intricate structure of the startup ecosystem, from early-stage ventures to scaling companies, and gain a deep understanding of the venture capital funding lifecycle. We'll delve into the diverse roles available within startups and VC firms, helping you identify where your unique skills and aspirations align best. Beyond theory, you'll learn actionable strategies for networking, personal branding, and identifying genuine opportunities.

Uniqueness & Value

What makes this course unique is its focus on the 'professional' perspective. We don't just explain 'what a startup is'; we show you 'how your career can fit into one' or 'how to leverage your expertise in a VC context'. Featuring real-world case studies and practical advice, this course provides the clarity and confidence you need to navigate this exciting transition. Whether you're looking to join a startup, invest, or simply understand the landscape, this course is your essential guide to unlocking new career possibilities in the innovation economy.
targetAudiences: Mid-career professionals considering a career change into the startup world.

Anyone interested in the innovation economy and its career pathways.
MBA students and recent graduates exploring non-traditional career paths.

Business developers and strategists looking to engage with startups.

courseDetails.shortDescription: From Beginner to Boardroom: Essential PowerPoint for Impactful Presentations

This course is expertly designed for digital marketers, IT professionals, business owners, and anyone aspiring to master the art and science of email communication. Starting with the basics, the course covers fundamental email protocols such as SMTP, POP3, and IMAP, explaining their roles in the email delivery process. It advances into the critical aspects of email authentication with comprehensive discussions on SPF, DKIM, and DMARC, teaching you how to fortify your email security and enhance trustworthiness. You will explore how to effectively manage your sender reputation, a key component in maintaining your email deliverability rates.


The course also delves into the legal landscapes of email marketing, offering insights into compliance with laws like GDPR, CAN-SPAM, and CASL, crucial for any business operating in or targeting customers in regulated markets. Additionally, it highlights the transformative impact of AI and machine learning on email marketing strategies—from optimizing send times to personalizing content to boost engagement and conversions.


Whether your goal is to enhance your email campaign results, ensure stringent compliance, or leverage the latest technologies, this course equips you with the knowledge and tools necessary for success in the competitive field of email marketing.

courseDetails.title: Emotional Intelligence: Personal & Professional Excellence
courseDetails.shortDescription: Emotional Intelligence Mastery: Boost Self-Awareness, Self-Regulation, Empathy, & Social Skills
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock your full potential and achieve unprecedented success in both your personal and professional life with "Emotional Intelligence: Personal & Professional Excellence." This comprehensive course is meticulously designed to equip you with the essential skills to understand, manage, and leverage your emotions, as well as effectively navigate the emotions of others.


Why Emotional Intelligence (EQ) Matters

In today's fast-paced world, technical skills alone are no longer enough. Emotional Intelligence, often referred to as EQ, is now recognized as a critical predictor of success, happiness, and leadership effectiveness. High EQ individuals are better at communication, conflict resolution, stress management, and building strong, lasting relationships. This course will show you how to develop these crucial competencies.


What You Will Learn

We will dive deep into the five core components of Emotional Intelligence, as defined by Daniel Goleman:

  • Self-Awareness: Understand your own emotions, strengths, weaknesses, values, and goals. Learn to recognize how your feelings impact your thoughts and actions.

  • Self-Regulation: Master the ability to manage your disruptive emotions and impulses. Cultivate trustworthiness, integrity, and adaptability in challenging situations.

  • Motivation: Discover your intrinsic drive to achieve, improve, and commit to your goals. Develop optimism and resilience in the face of setbacks.

  • Empathy: Learn to understand and share the feelings of others. Develop the capacity to sense others' emotions and take their perspectives, which is crucial for connection and influence.

  • Social Skills: Build proficiency in managing relationships and building networks. Enhance your ability to persuade, lead, and collaborate effectively.


What Makes This Course Unique?

This isn't just theory. This course is packed with practical exercises, real-world case studies, and actionable strategies that you can implement immediately. We provide a step-by-step framework to cultivate your EQ, moving beyond simple definitions to practical application. You'll gain a deeper understanding of human behavior and develop the tools to become a more effective communicator, a more inspiring leader, and a more fulfilled individual.


Join us on this transformative journey to elevate your emotional intelligence and unlock a future of personal satisfaction and professional excellence!

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF is present in 213 countries and has been chosen by more than 560 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Joao Martins is seasoned manager and entrepreneur, with over 30 years’ experience in top management positions in the telecommunications and IT sectors. Starting in an academic environment, where he obtained his PhD in Engineering and an MBA at Universidade Nova de Lisboa, quickly evolved to C-suite positions in the corporate environment, both in large corporations and in start-ups.

He is currently a director and start-up shareholder in an IT integrator in Lisbon, focused on cybersecurity. With a passion for education, he also an invited Professor at Nova Information Management School, teaching Knowledge Management and Financial Analysis to graduate and undergraduate students.


Business leadership is the art of guiding an organization towards success. It involves setting a clear vision, inspiring employees, and making strategic decisions that propel the company forward. Effective leaders create a positive work environment where people feel motivated and empowered to contribute their best.


Core Functions of a Business Leader:

  • Visionary: Business leaders paint a picture of the future – the company's goals and aspirations. They articulate a compelling vision that excites and unites the team.

  • Strategic Decision-Making: Leaders make tough calls, weighing risks and opportunities to navigate the business towards its goals.

  • Motivator and Coach: They inspire and empower employees, helping them grow and develop their skills.

  • Effective Communicator: Leaders clearly communicate the vision, plans, and expectations to everyone in the organization.

  • Team Builder: They foster collaboration and build strong, cohesive teams that work effectively together.


Why Leadership Skills Matter for Your Career:

Developing leadership skills is crucial for career advancement. Here's why:

  • Increased Visibility: Leaders stand out. They take initiative, solve problems, and get things done, which grabs the attention of superiors.

  • Promotion Potential: Companies are always looking for strong leaders to fill management positions.

  • Stronger Teams: If you can lead and motivate others, you'll be a valuable asset on any team, making you a desirable candidate for projects and assignments.

  • Adaptability and Change: The business world is constantly evolving. Strong leadership skills equip you to adapt to change and navigate challenges.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to the "Certified AI Fundamentals Professional" course! In today's rapidly evolving technological landscape, Artificial Intelligence (AI) is not just a buzzword; it's a transformative force reshaping industries, creating new opportunities, and redefining the future of work. This course is meticulously designed to provide you with a robust and comprehensive understanding of AI's core principles and applications.


Why AI Matters Now More Than Ever

AI is no longer confined to research labs; it's integrated into our daily lives, from smart assistants and recommendation engines to autonomous vehicles and medical diagnostics. Professionals across all sectors need to understand AI's capabilities, limitations, and ethical implications. This course bridges that gap, empowering you with the knowledge to thrive in an AI-driven world.


What You'll Learn

This program takes you from foundational concepts to practical applications, covering:

  • Core AI Concepts: Understand what AI truly is, its history, and its various subfields.

  • Machine Learning (ML): Dive into the heart of modern AI, exploring supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning paradigms, and key algorithms.

  • Deep Learning Basics: Get an introduction to neural networks and how they power advanced AI capabilities.

  • Natural Language Processing (NLP): Discover how machines understand and generate human language.

  • Computer Vision: Explore how AI enables computers to "see" and interpret images and videos.

  • AI Ethics & Future Trends: Grapple with the societal impact, ethical considerations, and exciting future directions of AI.


Course Uniqueness & Value

Unlike many superficial introductions, this course offers a structured, in-depth learning path that doesn't shy away from technical concepts but presents them in an accessible manner. We focus on building a solid conceptual foundation, ensuring you not only know *what* AI does but *how* and *why*. By the end, you'll be equipped with the fundamental literacy to confidently engage in AI-related discussions, evaluate AI projects, and set yourself up for further specialization in this exciting field. Become a Certified AI Fundamentals Professional and unlock new career possibilities!

courseDetails.title: Introduction to Risk Management - Decision Makers & Leaders
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understanding Risk Management Concepts
courseDetails.longDescription:
Understanding Risks, how to identify, assess, mitigate and monitor them for decision making is crucial to the success of any one in a role needing to make calls.


We examine the concepts around Risk Mitigation, for decision makers and anyone in a position of leadership/responsibility.


Risk is something we live with daily in business and all around us. It is not so much as not to have ANY risks (where ideal), but by definition, carrying on in business is a risk and presents multiple risks. So, we need to explore ways we can manage those risks.

Risk management refers to the process of identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks that could potentially impact the business or organisation or performance of an institution or its clients.

This course explores:

- Various approaches to risk

- Various risks that could occur in any business or organisation

- Managing and mitigating risks

- Creating an environment of risk awareness and mitigation is normal


Some of the introductory concepts we look include:

- Common approaches to risk

- Risk Identification

- Risk Assessment

- Risk Measurement and Monitoring

- Risk Mitigation

- Regulatory Compliance and more


Overall, effective risk management is essential for maintaining business and financial stability, protecting against losses, and building trust and confidence among stakeholders.


Decision Makers and Leaders can develop the skills to managing risks, ensuring that the organisation and it's stakeholders are protected as well as served to the benefit of all.
